docs.abstract: Iran’s ability to deploy militias to attack the American Embassy, with Iraqi support, made clear how much power it wields in Iraq.
docs.snippet: Iran’s ability to deploy militias to attack the American Embassy, with Iraqi support, made clear how much power it wields in Iraq.
docs.lead_paragraph: BAGHDAD — After a second day of tense protests at the American Embassy in Baghdad, thousands of pro-Iranian demonstrators dispersed on Wednesday, ending a siege that had trapped American diplomats in the embassy compound overnight and winding down a potentially explosive crisis for the Trump administration.

headline.main: Pro-Iranian Protesters End Siege of U.S. Embassy in Baghdad
headline.print_headline: Pro-Iran Clash At U.S. Embassy Ends in Baghdad

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

byline.original: By Falih Hassan and Alissa J. Rubin

docs.abstract: Officials said several guns were found in the penitentiary.
docs.snippet: Officials said several guns were found in the penitentiary.
docs.lead_paragraph: A fight at a prison in northern Mexico has left at least 16 inmates dead and five wounded, the local authorities said, in one of the worst outbreaks of violence in the country’s troubled penal system for years.

headline.main: Mexico Prison Fight Leaves at Least 16 Inmates Dead
headline.print_headline: 3-Hour Fight In Mexican Jail Leaves 16 Dead

docs.abstract: Breaking out the crystal roundball for some (almost) fearless predictions for the N.B.A. in 2020.
docs.snippet: Breaking out the crystal roundball for some (almost) fearless predictions for the N.B.A. in 2020.
docs.lead_paragraph: It’s a must this time of year: Let’s break out the crystal roundball to share eight more (almost) fearless predictions for the N.B.A. in 2020.

headline.main: Fearless Predictions for the N.B.A. in 2020
headline.print_headline: Zion, Kawhi, Pop and the Olympics: Here’s 2020 in Review

docs.abstract: Now we have written a book together.
docs.snippet: Now we have written a book together.
docs.lead_paragraph: At the end of my 40s, I am a father again for the second time, when I never expected to be a father at all. My own father, 85, was elated when I told him of his fifth grandchild.

headline.main: Every Moment With My Son Is an Act of Creation
headline.print_headline: Bridging the Gaps in Time and Love

docs.abstract: How to survive the internet in 2020. (It’s not going to be easy.)
docs.snippet: How to survive the internet in 2020. (It’s not going to be easy.)
docs.lead_paragraph: The new year is here, and online, the forecast calls for several seasons of hell. Tech giants and the media have scarcely figured out all that went wrong during the last presidential election — viral misinformation, state-sponsored propaganda, bots aplenty, all of us cleaved into our own tribal reality bubbles — yet here we go again, headlong into another experiment in digitally mediated democracy.

docs.abstract: Sheriffs in western Nebraska and eastern Colorado say they don’t know who’s flying the drones — or why. The F.A.A. is investigating.
docs.snippet: Sheriffs in western Nebraska and eastern Colorado say they don’t know who’s flying the drones — or why. The F.A.A. is investigating.
docs.lead_paragraph: They come in the night: Drones — lots of them — flying in precise formations over the Colorado and Nebraska prairie.

headline.main: ‘It’s Creepy’: Unexplained Drones Are Swarming by Night Over Colorado
headline.print_headline: ‘It’s Creepy’: Unexplained Drones Swarm by Night Over Prairie

docs.abstract: Computers that are trained to recognize patterns and interpret images may outperform humans at finding cancer on X-rays.
docs.snippet: Computers that are trained to recognize patterns and interpret images may outperform humans at finding cancer on X-rays.
docs.lead_paragraph: Artificial intelligence can help doctors do a better job of finding breast cancer on mammograms, researchers from Google and medical centers in the United States and Britain are reporting in the journal Nature.

headline.main: A.I. Is Learning to Read Mammograms
headline.print_headline: Artificial Intelligence Is Outperforming Radiologists in Detecting Breast Cancer

docs.abstract: The company’s prima donna showed off her past, present and future artistry in acts from three Puccini operas.
docs.snippet: The company’s prima donna showed off her past, present and future artistry in acts from three Puccini operas.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Opera used to like to ring in the new year with a starry gala. But Peter Gelb, the company’s general manager since 2006, has preferred to use the occasion to unveil new productions, combining the festive evening with ambitious artistic statements.

headline.main: Review: Anna Netrebko Rings in the Year With a Met Gala
headline.print_headline: A Prima Donna Rings In New Year

docs.abstract: Weeks of relative calm ended on Wednesday, as people marched in large numbers and the police deployed tear gas and pepper spray.
docs.snippet: Weeks of relative calm ended on Wednesday, as people marched in large numbers and the police deployed tear gas and pepper spray.
docs.lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — Hong Kong protesters began the new year the way they’d spent much of the old one: in the streets.

headline.main: Hong Kong Protesters Return to Streets as New Year Begins
headline.print_headline: Protesters’ Confidence Slipping, Hong Kong Clashes Resume

byline.original: By Russell Goldman, Elaine Yu and Lam Yik Fei

docs.abstract: From smart homes to ultrafast wireless speeds, here’s what to watch.
docs.snippet: From smart homes to ultrafast wireless speeds, here’s what to watch.
docs.lead_paragraph: The 2010s made one thing clear: Tech is everywhere in life.

headline.main: The Tech That Will Invade Our Lives in 2020
headline.print_headline: Getting Siri And Alexa To Cooperate
